Hi Bianca - thank you for your booking request. I am unfortunately not available on the 20th June. I could however offer you any of the following if that works for you: 

Weds 18th June at 2 pm,

Monday 30th June at 2:30 pm, 3:30 pm or 4 pm.

Tuesday 1 July, between 1 pm - 3 pm, or 3:30 pm - 4:30 pm.

Wednesday 2 July anytime between 11 am - 3 pm. 

Please note that blow dry, silk press etc is not included, if you wish to book those services you can do so too. 

Please let me know if any of the alternative times work for you. 

Many thanks
